title: The Huge UNIFY Gathering 2020 Lineup Will Drag You Out Of Mosh Retirement
text:
Practice your spin-kicks and don your loosest mesh shorts, folks: the Unify Gathering 2020 lineup is here, featuring some of the heaviest acts in metalcore and adjacent -cores.

British legends Architects and US outfit The Ghost Inside will demolish Victoria’s Tarwin Lower in January, marking incredible resilience for both acts: the former band lost founding member Tom Searle to cancer in 2016, while The Ghost Inside made a triumphant live comeback this year after a tragic 2015 bus accident.

Joining them will be Aussie talent including Northlane, Polaris, Tonight Alive, and The Beautiful Monument, along with international crushers like Knocked Loose, Antagonist A.D. and Stray From The Path.

Cop this:

Architects

The Ghost Inside

Northlane

Polaris

Silverstein

Tonight Alive & Friends

Make Them Suffer

Stray From The Path

Dear Seattle

Void Of Vision

Antagonist A.D.

Knocked Loose

Tired Lion

Kublai Khan TX

The Beautiful Monument

Eat Your Heart Out

Between You And Me

The Brave

Diamond Construct

Columbus

Tapestry

Sleep Talk

Caged Existence

Something Something Explosion

If you’re keen to spend January 9 through 12 camping and thrashing, you best head over to the Unify website for ticketing deets.
description: Architects, The Ghost Inside, Northlane, and Tonight Alive will bring it to Victoria.
